page.title: 17Local Services
page.content: Our D-block is situated in the country side. The main village is North Leigh, the nearest town is Witney which is two miles away. Because it is in the country, there are not many public services. There are two shops, one garage, one school, two public houses, one post office, one library, two telephone boxes and a vet. There is no doctor, dentist, fire service or police station. For these services you would have to go to Witney. A bus travels through North Leigh, but not very often. There are four bus stops. If a fire broke out, the fire engine would have to come from Witney. If there was a car crash, the police would take a long time to arrive as well. by Edward Clayton
